step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_ANNOTATION (PID) (SELECT P.PID FROM IX_ANNOTATION P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_ANNOTATION (PID) (SELECT PID FROM IX_ANNOTATION P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');
DELETE FROM IX_ANNOTATION P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_ANNOTATION T);
DELETE FROM IX_ANNOTATION_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_ANNOTATION T );
DELETE FROM IX_ANNOTATION_FLAG P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_ANNOTATION T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_ANNOTATION SELECT PID FROM IX_ANNOTATION A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_ANNOTATION B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
